    • notifyOtherPlayerEarlyLanded

      public void notifyOtherPlayerEarlyLanded(String nickname)
      Notifies when another player has made an early landing. Shows a notification to inform about the player's early exit.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who landed early

    • getControllerType

      public String getControllerType()
      Specified by:
      getControllerType in class GuiController

    • showMessage

      public void showMessage(String message, boolean isPermanent)
      Displays a message to the player. If the message is permanent, it remains on screen until replaced. If not, it uses a fade effect and disappears after a short duration.
      Specified by:
      showMessage in class GuiController
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display
      isPermanent - true if the message should persist, false for a temporary display

    • getModelFxAdapter

      public ModelFxAdapter getModelFxAdapter()
      Gets the model adapter used for FX bindings and updates.
      Returns:
      The ModelFxAdapter instance used by this controller

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the card phase controller. Sets up the game boards, binds model data, and performs initial UI refresh.

    • updateCosmicCredits

      public void updateCosmicCredits(int credits)
      Updates the display of cosmic credits with an animation effect.
      Parameters:
      credits - The new amount of cosmic credits to display

    • showChoosePlanetMenu

      public void showChoosePlanetMenu()
      Displays the menu for choosing a planet to visit. Shows available planets and allows the player to select one or skip.

    • showStardustMenu

      public void showStardustMenu()
      Shows the stardust event menu with appropriate warnings about exposed connectors. Evaluates ship construction and applies flight day penalties if needed.

    • showAbandonedShipMenu

      public void showAbandonedShipMenu()
      Displays the abandoned ship interaction menu. Checks if player has enough crew members to visit and shows appropriate options.

    • showChooseCabinMenu

      public void showChooseCabinMenu()
      Shows the menu for selecting cabins and removing crew members. Allows players to choose which crew members to sacrifice.

    • showAbandonedStationMenu

      public void showAbandonedStationMenu()
      Displays the abandoned station interaction menu. Checks crew requirements and shows visit options if eligible.

    • showChooseCannonsMenu

      public void showChooseCannonsMenu()
      Displays the menu for selecting double cannons to activate in response to enemy cards.

      This method checks for available double cannons and battery boxes on the player's ship:

      • If no double cannons are available, a message is shown and single cannons are used.
      • If no battery boxes are available or batteries are exhausted, only single cannons are allowed.
      • If batteries and double cannons are available, opens the double cannon selection menu.
      This is triggered during combat events such as Pirates, Smugglers, SlaveTraders, or WarField.

    • showThrowDicesMenu

      public void showThrowDicesMenu()
      Displays the menu for throwing dice during combat or events. Shows appropriate messages based on the current card type.

    • showThrowDicePopUp

      public void showThrowDicePopUp()
      Shows a popup dialog for throwing dice. Allows the player to initiate the dice throw action.

    • showRewardMenu

      public void showRewardMenu()
      Displays the reward menu after successful combat or events. Shows available rewards and their consequences.

    • showFreeSpaceMenu

      public void showFreeSpaceMenu()
      Shows the free space menu for engine activation. Checks battery availability and allows double engine activation if possible.

    • showChooseDoubleEngineMenu

      public void showChooseDoubleEngineMenu()
      Displays the selection menu for activating double engines.

      The user must pair each selected double engine with a battery box. The menu includes:

      • Confirmation button to send selections to the server.
      • Reset option to clear selections and restart the process.
      • Skip button to avoid using double engines.
      Highlighting is applied to available double engines and batteries to assist the user.

    • showEpidemicMenu

      public void showEpidemicMenu()
      Displays the epidemic event menu.

      Shows an information popup explaining how the epidemic spreads among occupied cabins. If it's the player's turn, they are prompted to confirm and trigger the epidemic effect.

      Cabins that are connected to other occupied cabins will lose one crew member.

    • onGridButtonClick

      public void onGridButtonClick(int row, int column)
      Handles user interactions with the grid during card phases.

      This method delegates behavior based on the current card state, including:

      • Selecting double engines or batteries
      • Handling cannon selection and attacks
      • Placing or removing cargo cubes
      • Managing damage, ship repair, crew loss, and other event responses
      If the player's turn is not active, a message is shown instead of acting.
      Specified by:
      onGridButtonClick in interface BoardsEventHandler
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the clicked grid cell
      column - the column index of the clicked grid cell

    • showHandleCubesRewardMenu

      public void showHandleCubesRewardMenu()
      Displays the menu for handling cube rewards. Allows players to distribute received cargo cubes to storage.

    • showHandleSmallDanObjMenu

      public void showHandleSmallDanObjMenu()
      Shows menu for handling small dangerous objects. Allows players to use shields or take damage.

    • showBigMeteoriteMenu

      public void showBigMeteoriteMenu()
      Displays the menu for handling big meteorites. Shows impact information and defense options.

    • checkShipBoardAfterAttackMenu

      public void checkShipBoardAfterAttackMenu()
      Shows the menu for checking and repairing ship damage after attacks. Initiates damage assessment and repair process.

    • showComponentHitInfo

      public void showComponentHitInfo(Coordinates coordinates)
      Displays information about a component that was hit during an attack.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - The coordinates of the hit component

    • showInvalidComponents

      public void showInvalidComponents()
      Highlights invalid or incorrectly positioned components on the ship board. Used during repair and validation phases.

    • showShipParts

      public void showShipParts(List<Set<Coordinates>> shipParts)
      Highlights different parts of the ship with distinct colors. Used to show ship sections during various game phases.
      Parameters:
      shipParts - List of coordinate sets representing different ship sections

    • showBigShotMenu

      public void showBigShotMenu()
      Displays the menu for handling big shots. Shows impact information and unavoidable damage warning.

    • showHandleCubesMalusMenu

      public void showHandleCubesMalusMenu()
      Shows the menu for handling cube penalties. Manages the removal of cargo cubes as penalties.

    • showCrewMembersInfo

      public void showCrewMembersInfo()
      Displays information about crew member evaluation. Shows potential consequences of insufficient crew.

    • showDisconnectMessage

      public void showDisconnectMessage(String message)
      Shows a disconnection message when a player leaves the game.
      Specified by:
      showDisconnectMessage in class GuiController
      Parameters:
      message - the disconnection message to display

    • showPlayerLanded

      public void showPlayerLanded()
      Shows the early landing confirmation message for the current player. Displays the consequences of landing early and hides the land button.

    • notifyPlayerDisconnected

      public void notifyPlayerDisconnected(String disconnectedPlayerNickname)
      Notifies when a player has disconnected from the game.
      Parameters:
      disconnectedPlayerNickname - the nickname of the disconnected player
